
```{r karyotype results}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| eval: !expr params$kuadrc_karyotype

karyotype <- karyotype %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    dschrom_label = factor(
      dschrom,
      levels = 1:3,
      labels = c("Trisomy 21", "Translocation", "Mosaic")
    )
  ) %>%
  dplyr::pull(dschrom_label)

karyotype <- karyotype[!duplicated(karyotype)]

if (!is.na(karyotype)) {
  BRIDGE21::format_quarto("sections/blood/latex/karyotype.tex", type = "input")
  cat("\\textbf{Karyotype Result}: ", as.character(karyotype))
  BRIDGE21::format_quarto(type = "newpage")
}
```
